verses.verse: <S%G1473>"I<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G2445>Joppa<s%> <S%G4336>praying,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G1611>trance<s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3705>vision:<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G4632>container<s%> <S%G2597>descending,<s%> like it <S%G5613>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3607>sheet<s%> let <S%G2524>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> by <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G746>corners.<s%> <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> as far <S%G891>as<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

<S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739>When<s%> I had <S%G816>looked<s%> intently at <S%G2657>it,<s%> I considered, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G5074>four-footed<s%> animals of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> wild <S%G2342>animals,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> creeping <S%G2062>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4071>birds<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky.<s%>
<S%G1161>I<s%> also <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G450><s%>" 'Rise, Peter,4074 kill2380 and2532 eat!5315'"

<S%G1161>But<s%> a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> the second <S%G1208>time<s%> <S%G1537>out<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3739><s%>" 'What God2316 has cleansed,2511 don't3361 you4771 call2840 unclean.1537'"

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3415>I<s%> remembered the <S%G4487>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> how <S%G5613>he<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2491><s%>" 'John indeed3303 baptized907 in water,5204 but1161 you5210 will be baptized907 in1722 the Holy40 Spirit.4151'"

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G5613><s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>them<s%> the <S%G2470>same<s%> <S%G1431>gift<s%> <S%G2532>as<s%> <S%G2254>us,<s%> when we <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1161>Christ,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G2252>was<s%> <S%G1473>I,<s%> that I <S%G1415>could<s%> <S%G2967>withstand<s%> <S%G2316>God?<s%>"

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G191>heard<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> they held their <S%G2270>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G686>"Then<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>has<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1325>granted<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G3341>repentance<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2222>life!<s%>"

They <S%G3767%G99999>therefore<s%> who were scattered <S%G1289>abroad<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G2347>oppression<s%> that <S%G1096>arose<s%> <S%G1909>about<s%> <S%G4736>Stephen<s%> <S%G1330>traveled<s%> as far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G5403>Phoenicia,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2954>Cyprus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>speaking<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> to no <S%G3367>one<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> to <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G435>men<s%> of <S%G2953>Cyprus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2956>Cyrene,<s%> <S%G3748>who,<s%> when they had <S%G1525>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G1675>Hellenists,<s%> <S%G2097>preaching<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G1161>The<s%> <S%G3056>report<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G191>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3775>ears<s%> of the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> which <S%G3588>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%> They sent <S%G1821>out<s%> <S%G921>Barnabas<s%> to <S%G1330>go<s%> <S%G2193>as<s%> far <S%G2193>as<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%>

<S%G3739>who,<s%> when he had <S%G3854>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had <S%G1492>seen<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> was <S%G5463>glad.<s%> <S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3870>exhorted<s%> them <S%G3956>all,<s%> that with <S%G4286>purpose<s%> of <S%G2588>heart<s%> they should remain <S%G4357>near<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> were <S%G4369>added<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch.<s%> <S%G1161>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> that for a <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> they were <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G846>together<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G2425>many<s%> <S%G3793>people.<s%> <S%G5037>The<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G5537>called<s%> <S%G5546>Christians<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G13>Agabus<s%> stood <S%G450>up,<s%> and <S%G4591>indicated<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that there <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2532>a<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3625>world,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> also <S%G1096>happened<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the days <S%G2541>of<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius.<s%>
